definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Conclusion Heavy-moxibustion is a good method for constipation after stroke.
sentences.chinese: 結論重灸法是治療中風後便祕的良好方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion Moxibustion therapy is an effective method for acute gouty arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 結論中醫灸法治療痛風性關節炎急性期療效確切。

sentences.english: The study indicated that the treatment of moxibustion refer to patients of every age classes.
sentences.chinese: 本研究還顯示灸法適用於各年齡層患者。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of moxibustion on subgroup of T-cells of AIDS patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察灸法對AIDS患者T淋巴細胞亞羣的影響。

sentences.english: Characteristics and practical significance of The Illustrations of Moxibustion in Dunhuang Caves were studied and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 探討分析敦煌石窟《灸法圖》的特點及現實意義。

sentences.english: Explain the meaning of needling and moxibustion techniques and its important position.
sentences.chinese: 講解刺灸法的含義及其重要地位。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of flashing-fire moxibustion for herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察閃火灸法治療帶狀皰疹的療效。

sentences.english: Introduce the origins and development of moxibustion techniques.
sentences.chinese: 介紹灸法的起源與發展。

sentences.english: Shi moxibustion methods and a matter of attention to detail to be read, "On the direct moxibustion, " a text.
sentences.chinese: 施灸方法和注意事項必須詳細閱讀《灸法直論》一文。

sentences.english: What's the frequently-used acupuncture method for stiff neck?
sentences.chinese: 落枕常用刺灸法是什麼？

sentences.english: How many moxibustion therapies can be used to cure diseases with "fire"?
sentences.chinese: 用於“火”來灸療治病的灸法有多少種？

definition: fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)

acupuncture point (any point on any meridian)/category of 12 specific acupuncture points near the wrist or ankle, each lying on a different meridian (one of five categories collectively termed 五輸穴|五输穴)
traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
